Text: Seed please we are stuck on 93.4 % for 2 days.
please don't stop seeding and thanks for sharing!
MS Press ebook and exam dump included (154 questions and answers with basic explanation). Should be enough for an easy 90+ percent exam result.

Thanks for the upload.
ISO file includes: eBook, Practical Tests, Sample Chapters, Scripts, StartCD, and Webcasts folders.
It's a working ISO.
from Readme.txt:
------------------------------------------------------------------------
MCTS Self-Paced Training Kit (Exam 70-680): Configuring WindowsÂ® 7 eBook
------------------------------------------------------------------------
The complete text of the print book is contained on this DVD in a
searchable PDF eBook. To view this eBook, open the PDF file in the
\eBook folder.

Note: The eBook is in Portable Document Format (PDF). To view this
file, you will need Adobe Acrobat or Adobe Reader. For more
information about these products or to download Adobe Reader,
visit the Adobe Web site at http://www.adobe.com.

--------------
Practice Tests
--------------
The Microsoft Press Training Kit exam prep suite, which includes 
practice tests for Exam 70-680, is contained on this DVD in the
\Practice Tests folder. To install the Training Kit exam prep 
suite to your hard disk, run Setup.exe in the \Practice Tests
folder and follow the instructions that appear.

To uninstall the Training Kit exam prep suite, make the appropriate 
selection from Add Or Remove Programs in Control Panel.

------------------
Chapter 13 Scripts
------------------
Scripts mentioned in Chapter 13 of the print book are on this
DVD in the \Scripts folder. 

--------
Webcasts
--------
There are 10 .wmv Webcasts on Windows 7 included on this DVD in the
\Webcasts folder. To view a Webcast, open the Webcasts.htm and
click the appropriate link. You will need Windows Media Player to
watch these Webcasts.

---------------
